name: EnVue Health
description: EnVue Health is a digital health company offering a directory of multi-specialty and multi-discipline health professionals, combined with telemedicine services, focused on providing equitable care for BIPOC, underserved, and specialized populations.
one_liner: EnVue Health is a digital health company offering a directory of multi-specialty and multi-discipline health professionals, combined with telemedicine services, focused on providing equitable care for BIPOC, underserved, and specialized populations.
